title: Test responsiveness
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a desktop platform
custom_steps:
WHEN user decreases the viewport
AND WHEN user expands the viewport
custom_expected:
THEN all elements continue to appear on the page
AND no elements overlap any other in any viewport
AND images stay proportionate (not stretched or squished)
AND all elements function as expected.

Note: In Windows IE and Edge, Chatter images will be stretched.

title: Test mobile
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is using a mobile device
custom_expected:
THEN all elements appear on the page
AND no elements overlap any other
AND all elements function as expected

title: Dept Home - URL
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
custom_expected:
THEN the URL matches the Department Home page header

For example, Baseball Assistance Team has this URL: inside.mlb.com/web/baseball-assistance-team

(Test all Departments)

title: Dept Home page - nav open, at or below 991px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 991px
AND user is on a Department Home page
AND downward-facing carat has appeared within the header box
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the carat
custom_expected:
THEN header box expands to show nav
AND nav has 6 elements: Home, Documents, Message Board, Directory, Chatter, Bookmarks
AND the 6 elements are all left-aligned
AND the Home element is red
AND the other elements are dark blue
AND all 6 elements are dark blue and bold-faced

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19092)

title: Dept Home page - nav close
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 991px
AND user has clicked or tapped on the nav carat
AND the header box has expanded to show the nav
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the carat again
custom_expected:
THEN the nav disappears
AND the white box minimizes, shrinking from bottom to top

title: Dept Home - Message Board section - header appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND Message Board section has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN header reads: Message Board
AND header is dark blue and all caps
AND header left aligns with left end of dark blue rule

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19096)

title: Dept Home - Message Board section - message appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department home page
AND the Message Board section has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN each message title is dark blue
AND each byline reads: by [Team] [Owner or User]
AND titles and bylines do not overlap
AND a message can have a tag
AND the tag is red and underlined
AND the tag is left aligned with the message title

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19097)

title: Dept Home - Message Board section - Public permitted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND the Message Board section has appeared
AND user is not a member of the Department
AND a Department Owner has created public messages
custom_expected:
THEN user will see the public messages
AND messages will be in chronological order, most recent at the top

title: Dept Home - Members section - photos appearance

GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND Members section has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN up to 8 photos appear
AND anyone with a photo appearing is a member of the Department
AND members of other Departments do NOT appear
AND the left border of the left-most photo is aligned with the left end of the dark blue rule
AND photos have gray borders
AND photos are not stretched or squished
AND any member without a photo has a gray silhouette icon

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19107)

title: Dept Home - Recent Chatter - Chat appearance

GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND Recent Chatter section has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN each Chat date is dark blue and all caps
AND Chat dates are formatted MONTH DD, YYYY
AND below each Chat date is a Chat title
AND each Chat title is dark blue and boldfaced
AND dates and titles do not overlap
AND dates and titles left align with each other
AND a Chat can have an image
AND the image is to the left of the date and title
AND the left border of the image aligns with the left end of the dark blue rule
AND the image is not stretched or squished
AND the image does not overlap any other element

title: Dept Home - Documents section - document summary appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND Documents section has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN each document label reads: Last Updated
AND document labels are dark blue and all caps
AND each document date is dark blue and all caps
AND document dates are formatted MONTH DD, YYYY
AND evenly spaced between each label and date is a dark blue dot
AND the dot is vertically centered
AND below each label is a document title
AND each document title is dark blue and boldfaced
AND labels and titles left align with each other
AND a document summary can have an image
AND the image is to the left of the label and title
AND the left border of the image aligns with the left end of the dark blue rule
AND the image is not stretched or squished
AND no element overlaps any other

title: Dept Home - Documents section - document creation timestamp
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND user clicks on Documents, View Documents link
AND the user is on Documents page
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on icon to add documents
AND adds a file
AND Publishes
custom_expected:
THEN the document creation and modified times are in GMT UTC time zone, 4 hours ahead of EDT
* Note:  timestamp is 5 hours ahead during Daylight Savings Time months

title: OBSOLETE - Dept Home - Message Board appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND Message Board section has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN Message Board section has 4 elements: header, View link, rule, list of messages
AND header is left aligned with left end of dark blue rule
AND header reads: Message Board
AND View link is right aligned with right end of dark blue rule
AND messages in the list are left aligned with each other
AND each message has 2 elements: message title, byline
AND a message can have a 3rd element: tag
AND message titles are underlined
AND messages are separated by gray rules
AND left end of gray rules align with left end of dark blue rule
AND right end of gray rules align with right end of dark blue rule

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19630)

title: OBSOLETE - Dept Home - Recent Chatter appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND Recent Chatter section has appeared below the Follow or Create Event button
custom_expected:
THEN Recent Chatter section has 4 elements: header, View link, rule, list of chats
AND header is left aligned with left end of dark blue rule
AND header reads: Recent Chatter
AND View link is right aligned with right end of dark blue rule
AND up to 3 chats can appear
AND each chat has 2 elements: date, chat title
AND the date is formatted MON DD, YYYY
AND chat dates and titles are left aligned with each other
AND a chat can have a 3rd element: image
AND chat titles are underlined
AND chats are separated by gray rules
AND left end of gray rules align with left end of dark blue rule
AND right end of gray rules align with right end of dark blue rule

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19631)

title: OBSOLETE - Dept Home - Message Board section - select tag
custom_preconds:

title: OBSOLETE - Follow button - select
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND Follow button has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on Follow button
custom_expected:
THEN popup window appears
AND on the button the word Follow changes to Un-Follow (with hyphen)
AND Un-Follow is white and all-capped
AND checkmark has changed to an X
AND the X is red on a white circle

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19102)

title: OBSOLETE - Follow button - selected - popup appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND user has clicked or tapped on the Follow button
AND popup has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN popup is pale green
AND width of popup is a little less than the Follow button
AND the left side of the popup has a checkmark and a sentence: Your request completed successfully.
AND the checkmark and message are dark green
AND the right side of the popup has an X
AND the dark green is lighter than the sentence but darker than the popup background

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19103)

title: OBSOLETE - Follow button - selected - popup close
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND user has clicked or tapped on the Follow button
AND popup has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the X on the popup
custom_expected: THEN popup disappears from the bottom border up.

title: OBSOLETE - Follow button - selected - Main Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND user has clicked on the Follow button
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Main Page
custom_expected: THEN the name of the followed Department appears on the Main Page, under the My Departments header.

title: OBSOLETE - Un-Follow button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has followed a Department
AND user is on that Department's Home page
AND Follow button has appeared
AND button now reads Un-Follow instead of Follow
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Un-Follow button
custom_expected:
THEN popup window appears
AND popup looks and functions like the Follow button popup
AND on the button the word Un-Follow changes to Follow
AND Follow is white and all-capped
AND X has changed to a checkmark
AND the checkmark is red on a white circle

title: OBSOLETE - Un-Follow button - Main Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND the Un-Follow button has appeared
AND user has clicked or tapped on the Un-Follow button
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Main Page
custom_expected: THEN the name of the unfollowed Department does not appear on the Main Page under the My Departments header.
